description: Kurihara Sayaka is a maidservant of the household, she is roughly the opposite of Tomomi in that she is upbeat, playful, talkative, and at times childish. Although she is unable to ever clearly remember, Sayaka did in fact used to be a renowned promotional model and actress by the name of Yamato Ruri; acquired when she was found wandering the estate grounds by Harukawa Gohei.
name: Kurihara Sayaka
